## HastOptions interface

Options to modify the syntax tree of the hast code block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HastOptions 
```

|  [line](./highlighter.hastoptions.line.md) | <code>readonly</code> | (props: Partial&lt;LineElementProps&gt;) =&gt; Element | Override function for code block lines. |
